subject: Fiction, Gothic Fiction, Philosophical Fiction
description: The novel tells the story of a young man named Dorian Gray, who wishes that his portrait would age instead of him. As he pursues a life of hedonism and debauchery, his portrait reflects the consequences of his actions, while he remains outwardly youthful.

subject: Fantasy, Horror
description: A novel co-written by Stephen King and Peter Straub, it follows a young boy named Jack Sawyer on a quest across America and a parallel world called “The Territories” to find a talisman that can save his dying mother.

subject: Fiction, Mystery
description: A novel by Ivan Turgenev that explores the conflicting ideologies and romantic entanglements among Russian expatriates in a German spa town during the 19th century.
